text: The 1944 Appalachians tornado outbreak was a strong tornado outbreak. It hit the Midwest and Middle Atlantic United States on June 22â€“23, 1944. Shinnston, West Virginia was badly damaged by a very strong tornado. It is the worst tornado outbreak in West Virginia. Many hundreds of people were killed or hurt. ==References== Category:1944 in the United States Category:Tornadoes in the United States Category:Tornado outbreaks Category:June 1944 events
title: 1944 Appalachians tornado outbreak
